content_blocks.section: The Talent of Delegating: a game to develop leadership skills

content_blocks.text: The article "The talent of delegating: testing a game to improve soft skills in training offered by outsourced HR" presents the development and testing of the game"The Talent of Delegating",created to improve theability to delegate tasksto professionals in leadership positions, aged between23 and 35.With simple mechanics, such as thedrag and dropgesture, the game was designed to be intuitive and effective in teaching this fundamental skill for the corporate environment.
content_blocks.section: The Talent of Delegating: a game to develop leadership skills

content_blocks.text: During the testing process, the team improved the game based on theuser experience, ensuring ease of use and clarity in interactions. The results showed that participants were able tolearn and apply the concepts of delegationin a practical and efficient way - reinforcing the game's potential as a dynamic approach to developingsoft skillsaimed at leadership.
content_blocks.section: The Talent of Delegating: a game to develop leadership skills

content_blocks.text: More than just a game,"The Talent of Delegating"is aninnovative toolthat complements traditional training programs. By transforming learning into an interactive and engaging experience, the proposal contributes toimproving leadership skillsand offers companies a new way to strengthen their teams.
